Madobe Nanami no Windows 7 de PC Jisaku: Madobe Nanami is a computer store employee who instructs customers on how to magically assemble their PCs.  She also shows them some of the features of Windows 7.
[['Kawaguchi, Keiichirou', 'Director, Storyboard'], ['Yamaguchi, Satoshi', 'Key Animation, Character Design, Animation Director']]
